content.text1:
CRUST提供了Web3⽣态系统的去中⼼化存储⽹络，⽀持包括IPFS在内的多种存储
层协议，并对应⽤层提供接⼝。 Crust的技术栈还能够⽀持去中⼼化计算层。Crust
旨在构建⼀个重视数据隐私和所有权的分散式云⽣态系统。

TEE.title: 有意义的工作量证明
TEE.desc: 基于可信执行环境（Trusted Execution Environment,TEE）技术，Crust实现了有意义的工作量证明（Meaningful Proof of Work, MPoW）机制，使得有意义的存储量的统计变得更加简单可靠

MPoW.title: 以存储资源为担保额度
MPoW.desc: MPoW机制可信量化的存储资源包含有意义的存储量和可用存储的供应量。基于这种被可信量化的存储资源作为担保额度的共识协议(Guaranteed Proof of Stake, GPoS)，Crust激励节点提供更多存储资源的同时也保证了网络更高的安全性

GPoS.title: 去中心化的存储和计算
GPoS.desc: 基于以存储资源为担保额度的共识和有意义的工作量证明机制，Crust可以支持从存储到计算的量化和共识，实现去中心化的泛在云服务

productMatrix.title: 产品矩阵
productMatrix.row-1-desc: 提供一个分布式云存储应用
productMatrix.1-t1-intro1:
存储服务单价更低，
文件再多无压力
productMatrix.1-t1-intro2: 存储服务单价更低，文件再多无压力
productMatrix.1-t2-intro1:
芯片级安全，
不再担心个人隐私别被窃取
productMatrix.1-t2-intro2: 芯片级安全，不再担心个人隐私别被窃取
productMatrix.1-t3-intro1:
服务节点无处不在，
上传下载更快捷
productMatrix.1-t3-intro2: 服务节点无处不在，上传下载更快捷
productMatrix.row-2-desc: 提供一个兼容AWS S3接口的企业级云存储服务
productMatrix.2-t2-intro1:
提供企业级加密和隐私保护解决方案，
保护商业数据不泄露
productMatrix.2-t2-intro2: 提供企业级加密和隐私保护解决方案，保护商业数据不泄露
productMatrix.2-t3-intro1:
支持边缘计算，存储节点更贴近，
企业数据存取更快
productMatrix.2-t3-intro2: 支持边缘计算，存储节点更贴近，企业数据存取更快

members.name: Bova Chen
members.title: Co-Founder
members.desc: He has 15+ yrs experience of financial investment. He started asTMT researcher and then managed several funds as investment director. He founded Winsun Capital and did successful investments in crypto industry.

members.name: Leo Wang
members.title: Co-Founder
members.desc: He has 15+ yrs experience in IT industry. Leo worked in Microsoft and Cisco as senior development lead. He got rich experience in distributed storage, cloud computing and blockchain, and led a blockchain-based projectto store and exchange manufacturing data in different geo-locations.

members.name: Zikun Fan
members.title: Technical Lead
members.desc: He got his master degree in Computer Science from ZheJiangUniversity and received the PhD offer from CERCS Lab of Georgia Tech. Zikun worked in Microsoft on Azure Kubernetes and blockchain based projects.

members.name: Steve Shi
members.title: Market Lead
members.desc: He got 10+ yrs experience of marketing, program operation and new product management in IT Industry. Steve got both master degrees in MBA from Shanghai Jiaotong University. He worked in Cisco to support new productglobal launch business.

members.name: Dean Yan
members.title: Product Lead
members.desc: Dean is experienced in information security and blockchain technologies. He has been working in Cisco on supply chain blockchain based projects, one of his innovation projects was announced in globalDevelopment@Cisco conference.

members.name: Yang Zhao
members.title: Core developer
members.desc: Yang got his master's degree from Tsinghua University. He has participated in open source projects and made significant contributions. Yang worked in Microsoft on cyber security, distributed storage and big data projects.

members.name: Yao Zhao
members.title: Core developer
members.desc: Yao got his master’s degree from Shanghai Jiaotong University.He is experienced in Data security and Linux kernel technologies. Yao worked inCisco IT security department and participated several blockchain projects.
